channel.title: Solid-State Battery on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Solid-State Battery on FinanClub

item.title: QS
item.description: score:5 Chances: It has a pretty big lead over others developing solid-state batteries. But that doesn’t promise it will be a winner. The EV battery maker just got good news about its solid-state battery. Is it a buy? QuantumScape has lost much of the hype surrounding it early on, but it still has the potential to be a game changer.
